short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fido expands Youtube descriptions into widgets. We dig through your Youtube descriptions so you don't have to!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Primary feature: adds corgi icon to every youtube video page
Secondary features: shows you useful information

Upcoming features

==============

- More widgets (Genius lyrics, Twitter feeds, and more!)
- First class theater mode support
- See where else the video is being discussed! (Reddit, Twitter)
